subject: RE: [junit] Custom report
msgSnippet: Check out Ant (http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/index.html) It includes a JUnit and JUnitReport task that capture the results in XML and then apply formatting to
messageBody:
Check out Ant (http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/index.html) It includes a JUnit
and JUnitReport task that capture the results in XML and then apply
formatting to them to produce some very nice HTML pages.

M. Erik Husby
